item.title: Welcome!
item.author: am-eesh44@hotmail.com (Ameesh Booodhna)
item.description: Hey! I’m Ameesh, a 2nd year student at SUPINFO University. I created this website by using Hugo, a static site generator and then deployed it using Netlify. I manage its contents using Forestry.io as well as Netlify CMS.
